content.detailedDescription: A weird glowing object flew over during the day, witnessed by myself and 2 sons. i got video and 2 photos of it. could be the space station, but it was damn low if it was. check out the video and pics. their was no noise heard coming from it. it was flying south west. from hollidaysburg/duncansville, pa toward blue knob.
content.summary: Wierd glowing object flying over during the day

content.detailedDescription: heading west on center st. in lewiston, ny,i looked up through the windshield and saw 6-8 white starlike lights but round and bigger than a star. my friend m., who was with me , saw them also. we stopped and got out of the car to look; they were completely stationary. we got back into the car, drove about three blocks with the objects in view.Then they instantaneously vanished,no trace ,no contrail.
content.summary: Two witnesses to distant stationary lights

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my back yard  watching the end of the toledo ohio 4th of july fireworks. from one spot in my back yard i could see them. i heard a large bang  from a fireworks shell go off to my rear. i turned around and  watched the firework dissipating .Then i saw this light that was moving from east to west .This light was different than any i have ever seen. i see lifeflight,promedaca helcopters,fighter jets from the local air nat guard ,local passenger jets from toledo express airport and we  get a lot of  air traffic out of detroit mi. the light was orange in color.As the light came closer i  could make it out  as a sphere. i was facing directly east .This sphere moved slowly  from east to west. the sphere moved with no noise that i could could tell but there was fireworks going off all around me at the time .I was alone at the time and there was no one within sight. i was looking eastward at the time. the sphere moved in a(one o'clock ) position over my right shoulder .I follord the sphere to the south then to the west.I can not tell how  large it was but after the sphere was gone i took some change out of my pocket and  started to hold  coins  up at  arms length. the closest coin was a dime,but the sphere was a little smaller.If you were looking south the sphere moved  west till it got to the (2 o'clock)position then with no curve turned to the south west about 45 degrees and  kept on going . i lost the sphere when it went  past  trees across the street from my house . after the siteing i went inside my house and  tried to wright down what i saw . after that i took my compass and   made sure of my  directions .I live on a corner and the street in fron of my house runs east to west i did not feel  scared or nervous when i saw  the sphere. i knew  that the light  was different than  i have ever seen so  i watched it go by .
content.summary: Orange sphere flying east to west

content.detailedDescription: Aug, 2, 2008, my wife and i and her visiting friend were walking thru our subburban neighborhood saturday evening. their was a slight breeze so it was very comfortable (no bugs) and the temporature was nice (maybe 75 f), a massive heat lightning storm was constantly lighting up the eastward sky (towards raleigh nc) from us in fuquay varina nc. no rain, no thunder. at 10:30pm (approx) my wife said "are you seeing that?" we stopped in the street and looked up and in the direction of the lightning, but between us the lightning was a single glowing silent bluish green round orb. slowing accending and getting farther away. i had no watch, cel phone nor camera of any kind. we watched it accend and fade into the distance in about 60 seconds. it had a smooth spline flight path but not exaclty straight. i moved like it could be a self-illuminated turquoise balloon. but it's size was much bigger than the regular basketball-sized party balloon. if you hold out your arm and look at your pinky fingernail. it was about that size in the sky. and we would guess a few thousand feet away at least. so i would estimate it to be at least the size of a van. maybe 1/3 the size of a hot air balloon. but a party balloon that size in the sky would only be a few houses away, maybe 200 feet. this thing was up in the sky and getting higher and "drifting" away at a pretty good speed. it had to be bigger. it glowed a strange color. not green color like a street light. more of a turquoise color. i say it was more green and my wife says it was more blue. but we both agree it was turquoise. it was completely silent. straight above us was clear sky with no clouds and bright white stars. it was not "bright" like venus was that night. it was dimmer but still clearly defined against the sky. possibly it was brighter at the center than the edges of the object but i can't say for certain. i've never seen an object that color in the sky before. if got so distant you could not see it anymore. there was a few neighbors (2 adult men) also looking in the object's direction standing in the street (probably looking at the constant lightning which was beautiful) and i was gonna ask them if they saw the object but before i reached them they went inside. i don't know them so i did not ring their doorbell. the next day i asked a few nieghbors i do know and they or course laughed and said no they didn't see anything the night before. then i googled to see if anyone else saw the object and found a wikipedia description of the same or similar turquoise object (the one i saw never grew a white comet-like tail) being spotted in nearby charlotte a year or so before. so after telling my wife that, she said i should report it. i called the local police and they said anything having to do with the sky is the faas domain. so i called them and got an answering machine. i left a message. then i left a message at my local newspaper. then i came here to report it. i dunno what esle to do. where else to go. i really want to know what it was - and stangely as i was watching it, i was already bummed out that i'll probably never know what i'm looking even is. and although, i did not have a camera i'm a graphic artist so i immediately madea composite (re-creation) photograph or what it looked like. i hope you can understand the experince we had and help discern what it might've been. someone a mile or so away launched a huge self-illuminated turquoise balloon at 10:30pm on a saturday night is my best guess.
content.summary: Turquoise (bluish green) glowing sphere, silent, floating up and away, spline flight path,

content.detailedDescription: Saw a very bright light in the sky, brighter and bigger than a star. moving quickly, but not like a shooting star. totally silent. flew overhead, got very bright, then faded to black as it moved. the point where it faded to black had 4 lights in a diamond formation. those were not as bright as the original light. it definitely wasn't an airplane or satellite.
content.summary: Extremely bright light moving quickly, no sound, then faded to black.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on vacation in wyoming.  my sister's house is small and usually full to the brim with people, so i always camp outside in her yard--usually in a tent.  this year my tent blew down during a rain squall and was demolished, so i set up my cot and sleeping bag in the back of my pick-up in my camper top, and pulled the truck out further away from the house than usual, about fifty yards, to get out of a mosquito infested area.  i had taken a little drive in order to call my husband that night, up the highway where there was cell phone coverage, and then returned to my spot at about 10:30 p.M.  the ranch house is a mile off of the highway, and the only neighbor is grandpa's house, another eighth of a mile west from my sister's place and not visible from where i was parked.  

the kids were in town at the street dance, my mom and sis and brother-in-law in the house; i sat and smoked a couple of cigarettes and watched as the lights went down in the house which meant everyone had gone to bed.  i then got into my sleeping bag and was trying to get to sleep, when a mosquito came calling, and wouldn't leave me alone.  i probably layed there for a half hour trying to ignore this bug, and intermittently slapping at it before i finally got up out of the cot, grabbed a shirt and started slinging it all around the inside of the camper to rid myself of the irritation.  after a bit of that, i stopped and listened to see if i could hear the mosquito buzzing any more, facing the house (west) on my knees, when a bright light caught my attention, from the right side (north).  i turned to look and saw a pea or dime-sized glowing sparkly sphere of light above the trees toward the hills to the south.  for three seconds it moved to the right (easterly) and downwards, went behind some tree branches, then appeared again for another three seconds or so, continuing downwards and then disappeared behind more tree branches.  it's flight was jagged, or cork-screwing slightly, not completely smoothe and it was not going fast, but just drifting along somewhat erratically.  it's outline was not distinct, but the glow was circular in form, and the sparkly appearance might be better described as an internal fire exuding streaks or sparks of light.  when i first saw it i thought for a second that it could have been the kids' headlights up on the hill coming home from the dance, but it was way too early for them to be coming home (they didn't come in until the wee hours), and this light was going the wrong direction (they would have been traveling westwardly) and it was no headlight!  i sat and waited for the thing to come back or appear again, but to no avail.  i didn't even think at the time that i could have driven up there to see more; i think i decided that it was long gone and there was no point in searching it out.  after fifteen minutes or so of watching for it to come back, i got back in bed and fell fast asleep. 

weather conditions were extremely hazy and smokey from the california wildfires this summer, but stars were out that night, and so was the moon (full or almost full, i think).  we had had a small amount of rain earlier in the evening (the squall that blew down my tent) but the weather had cleared and i did not observe any clouds in the part of the sky that i could see.

the only other thing that might be pertinent is that there is a power line that runs partway along the "driveway" to the house along the top of the hills to the north.  the hills there are sagebrush prairie with no trees, but neither the power lines or the hills were visible from my vantage point which was down in the trees near the house.

i've been spending my summers there for the last seven years, and we have seen some strange things while out star-gazing, but this was the closest (as in, nearest) encounter i have had with any of these strange sightings.
content.summary: A sparkly sphere floated downward behind trees

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside the carport of our home and taking pictures of sudden fierce storm clouds during an unusual power outage.  when we uploaded the pics and enlarged them we saw the 5 objects shown in the pictures (picture 5). picture 6 has one object still in the frame and picture 4 shows the funnel effect originally.  we did not know there were going to be objects in photographs when they were originally taken.
content.summary: 5 objects in storm clouds not seen until enlarged digital photo was viewed

content.detailedDescription: While loading tobacco onto a wagon to take to the barn, i was on the ground, my brother-in-law was on the tractor and my father was on the wagon. i handed a stick of tobacco up to my father to load onto the wagon, he walked over to the edge to receive the tobacco and i noticed what i thought were heat waves coming off his right shoulder; which was to my left because he was facing me. but as he moved away from me the waves were still there. then i noticed it was something coming down at about a 60 degree angle. i couldn't really tell what it was and it wasn't really moving that fast as far as i could tell. it actually looked like it was pushing the atmosphere away from it on each side but it could have been heat. it leveled out and came straight toward the tobacco field and went across in front of us to a point and then was coming back in the exact same path, it didn't even stop and turn, just came back at the same speed, nothing can do that. that's when i yelled, "what's that"? my father and brother-in-law couldn't see it. my brother-in-law saw a big plane on the horizon, making a landing approach to blue grass field in lexington, ky. but this was much closer and faster. to try to keep track of it, you would have had a move your arm across the sky very fast. the plane looked like it was stopped in comparison. if you had not seen what i thought were heat waves on my father's shoulder, and kept track, you would never have seen it because it was almost invisible. you could either almost see through it, or it was reflecting the blue sky and white clouds off it's surface, because it was not defined, it almost looked projected, if that makes any sense. it was cylinder in shape, turned vertical, and what i think were two lines of blue windows. it was spinning so fast that there seemed to be blue smears from the windows and silver smears from the craft itself. i did not point to it until it was going back the way it had come, i was trying to figure out what it was, but when i did point, i felt something sinister looking back at me from those windows. it followed that exact path, turned up at the exact spot where it leveled out coming down, and shot up at 60 degree angle so fast that it almost looked as if it disappeared. all of this took about ten seconds in broad daylight. my father said it was probably something from the military. i was just entering high school and had never heard the term ufo or anything like it. but after school and the us navy, and with more education, i relized what i had seen. i'm not very good and concise with words so this is long. i finally told a few close friends, but this is the first time i've ever written it down in detail.
content.summary: While harvesting tobacco with my father and brother-in-law, saw vertical cyclinder come down and across and back up.

content.detailedDescription:
I had gone out to get something from the car. it was about 9:30 in the evening and i walked down our sidewalk i glanced up at the night sky and noticed something odd to the southeast.  at first it appeared to be a large star but it increased in size and intensity...As it did so it changed from a yellow to an orange color and then was gone.
  i stood there several minutes trying to figure out what i had just seen...It seemed impossibly large for a star...
  i stared at the spot wanting to see it again, and almost missed it because it had moved up and to the left of its last position very quickly...It repeated the size,color, and brightness change and was gone.
  i looked for awhile but didn't see it again.
content.summary: Light increased in intensity going from yellow to orange and then disappearing.

content.detailedDescription: We (my wife and i) we see silent orbs almost every nite. i use celestron 17x85 binoculars but cant get a detailed enough view. i live about 4 miles away from the airport (10 years or so) and know the flight patterns, these are not planes no faa lites and no noise from the turbines. i agree somthing is certainly escalating.
content.summary: In response to philadelphia sightings

content.detailedDescription: I was in se michigan, about 15 miles north of toledo, oh when my husband and i saw the bright light in the sky that vanished.  he is a complete skeptic, but did concur that it was definitely not an airplane, helicopter, or satellite.  i am amazed at the sightings of this same phenomenon, from washington to new jersey.  i wish i could have filmed it, but didn't have time to grab my camera.
content.summary: Response to charlevoix, mi bright light in sky

content.detailedDescription:
I did not see these objects until i uploaded them.  they appear to be in motion.  the smoke you see is cigarette smoke.  i noticed someone uploaded a video to youtube taken the same day, except it was dark out and when i paused the video, the objects look exactly what i caught on camera.  i took a photo before this one and there were no objects in the photo.

the time was 8:19 pm on 24 july 2008. location was gladwin, mi.
content.summary: 3 ufo's in motion

content.detailedDescription:
To the person who wrote the aug 3rd michigan sighting:
where were you when you saw the light? what town?
i had the same thing happen in charlevoix, mi on friday
aug 1st at 9:40pm. my 10 year old son noticed the extreemly
bright, non-flashing white light at the same time i did.
my son said, "dad, what's that?" i replied, "i don't know."
i ran into the cabin & grabbed the binoculars & by the time
i came out of the cabin & got a "fix" on the location, the bright
white light turned a red and came to a stop. a stop right in the 
middle of orion's belt. we watched it for over an hour but it never
moved, changed color or did anything from the point it stopped.

we were on lake charlevoix between horton's bay & oyster bay facing
south. the object moved from west to east & then out..Out towards the
center star of orions belt. time was 9:40.

again, we (my son & i) observed the super bright non-flashing 
white light for roughly 10 seconds. i ran into the cabin to grab 
binoculars(that took only 10 seconds because my son & i timed it 
the following day). when i came out of the cabin it was still
bright white & then stoped exactly at the center star of orions
belt & changed to red & moved out/away from us. 
at 9:40pm in northern michigan it is still light out side. 

the size & elevation are hard to estimate. if were a plan or 
helicopter, we would have heard the noise due to the size of the 
light.
content.summary: Bright white light

content.detailedDescription: I like to view high clouds, thin as funny things fly on.��� the object was about 39k feet and moving slowing, causually towards the east, near grand rapids mich.��� what really caught my eye was this very clear blue orb, kind of looked like a corvette frame.��� i watched this object float along, slowly.��� then, the object moved towards the north and for about 30 seconds i could see the object.��� then, as i looked at the object, it was gone.��� immediately, it was gone.��� i did not hear any noise.��� did not see the object again.��� ben mocini
content.summary: About 39k feet, near grand rapids, mi. a "floating" orb, moving slowly towards the east. then, a slow move north and vanashed.

content.detailedDescription: I uploaded your picture to my computer and did some minor adjustments to contrast, brightness, etc.  i noticed something.  these three lights are attached to one single object.  in the first pic you can clearly see the edges because of where the light begins, bends and stops.  the second picture is where i added some lines to indicate what i'm talking about.  click back and forth and imo it is the legendary triangle ufo.
content.summary: In response to md,us ie: 3 lights in a field

content.detailedDescription:
1.Smoking cigarette on sun porch facing south.
2.Observed a glowing, yellow orange, circular to oval disc or spherical light getting brighter and appearing to approach from ssw to nne direction in a head-on direction. 
3.At first sight, possibly a meteorite or an aircraft/helicopter in trouble. looking like a fireball of some sort.
4.Circular to oval disc/spherical shape seemingly hoverng or proceeding at a speed too slow to be mistaken for an aircraft/helicopter. no visible aircraft navigational red/green/white lights, thus eliminating aircraft in trouble. direction appeared to come up canadian side of st.Clair river at approximately 5000 feet(difficult to estimate at night but above small scattered cumulus clouds to the left of glowing object that at that time of night would be at elevation 2000 to 3000 feet). after approximately 5 minutes seemed to go upward at faster speed at climb rate angle of 60 to 70 degrees and now appearing teardrop-shaped and slowly disappeared from view.
5.Intrigued and curious by sighting to the point of going outside to observe unidentified object for approximately 5 to 10 minutes. feeling of excitement at having seen this object. tried to send report to ufo canada network shortly afterward with no confirmation that it was actually sent and therefore i am forwarding this report to your organization.
6.Observed visually a now teardrop-shaped object disappear upward at a steep angle from canadian side of st.Clair river to u.S. side into a partly clear sky.  

n.B:  no sound heard from unidentified object.   

n.B:  should have been easily seen by anyone crossing bluewater bridges between sarnia, ontario and port huron, michigan and any pleasure craft or commercial vessel traffic on lake st clair, st clair river, and lower lake huron cut area.
content.summary: Bright yellow-orange at first, then white orange circular disc/oval shape with south-southwest to north-northeast trajectory abrupt upward climb at 60-70 degrees to disappearance,

content.detailedDescription:
i was getting home from my fianc���'s house at about 11:22 pm it was a clear night with a few clouds. i got of my car and stretched, while stretching, i noticed there was a multi-colored orb hovering about 5k feet north west of my house. it moved south very slowly and then banked east at an incredible rate of speed. at first i thought it was maybe a plane coming in for a landing because o'hare is about 15 miles away from my house, but at rate of speed it was traveling it could of in no way possible been a plane. it was pulsing orange, red and green. i got out a pair of binoculars to confirm what i was seeing. i brought my brother  outside to confirm what i was seeing and we snapped about 4 pictures of it. easily the craziest thing i have ever seen. while snapping the photo's the object disappeared and reappeared. it moved in bursts to the north but would always hover back south west to the original north west position that i first saw it in. i watched it for approximately 22 minutes until it disappeared.  i am going to get the film developed today.
please contact me w/ address to send pictures to!
content.summary: Wow im amazed!

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my balcony looking at the night sky when i picked up an electronic type sound in my right ear, the sound came back a couple of minutes later. i turned in the direction where i believed the sound emanated from and saw the object coming from the west to the east. i live near the airport and no planes come from that direction, that's what grabbed my attention too. i observed the object through a pair of astronomer binoculars but i still couldn't clearly identify it. it was just a ball of light travelling slowly and silently. no blinking lights of any kind.
as it got closer to me it just faded out and disappeared.
visbility was perfect, no clouds at the time.

i've heard strange electronic type sounds recently but this is the first time that i could actually link the sound with a ufo sighting. and the sounds come in pairs of 2.

what blew me away is the fact that it announced its arrival and the direction it was coming from with the sound i picked up with my right ear.

for some reason ufo activity in the philadelphia area has been intensifying in the past year. 

others are picking up on it also.

something is definitely going on.
content.summary: A silent sphere of white light

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my balcony looking at the night sky when i picked up an electronic type sound in my right ear, the sound came back a couple of minutes later. i turned in the direction where i believed the sound emanated from and saw the object coming from the west to the east. i live near the airport and no planes come from that direction, that's what grabbed my attention too. i observed the object through a pair of astronomer binoculars but i still couldn't clearly identify it. it was just a ball of light travelling slowly and silently. no blinking lights of any kind.
as it got closer to me it just faded out and disappeared.
visbility was perfect, no clouds at the time.

i've heard strange electronic type sounds recently but this is the first time that i could actually link the sound with a ufo sighting. and the sounds come in pairs of 2.

what blew me away is the fact that it announced its arrival and the direction it was coming from with the sound i picked up with my right ear.

for some reason ufo activity in the philadelphia area has been intensifying in the past year. 

others are picking up on it also.

something is definitely going on.
content.summary: A silent sphere of white light

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were standing outside around 10pm and noticed a really bright light moving fast across the sky (from west to east).  at first i thought it was just the headlight of an airplane, but as it went overhead it still remained bright and had no strobes.  it made no sound and was too low to be a satellite.  as it continued to travel to the east it faded to a dim red speck of light and disappeared.
content.summary: Bright fast moving light spotted then turned red and disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
Since i moved to the u.S from puerto rico in 1988, my family and i have been experiencing some abnormal activities at our household in towson, md.  every year we see blue lights in our back yard that illuminates everything in the backyard, even below tall heavy leafed trees.  we can't see where the lights are coming from.  we just see everything and next morning, no one saw a thing.  

a few times we called the police and confirmed that they were not out by helicopter nor on the ground scoping out our backyards with flood lights, possibly looking for a suspect.  the police we called to investigate found nothing.  we never called 911 for something like this again.  it was part of our life here in towson now.  trees around the area have been dying off.  many trees are partially dead.  it wasn't until recently that we concluded and suspect radiation from some craft were the cause to illness to our trees around here.  

usually, blue light sightings happen any time after 10pm, but most often after 4am at any time of the week.  there has been different experiences at my house.  from time to time my aunt who sleeps in the other room with opened curtains would see lights coming in and out of her bedroom window. white light beams that bend from one window out the other. she also saw lights dancing around her electric light switch.  like chistmas lights shaping around the light switch in different colors going around and around it for about 20 seconds.  my older brother moved out of the house in 1994 to join the army after he had an encounter with entities once, which is why he signed up to go into the army just to get away.  his never been home since, except to visit.  he never talked about it in detail.

in addition, just recently, my friend steve experienced a sighting one night after i had a visit during my sleep.  for the first time in my life, i heard a strange sound in my sleep and was very relaxed.  i dreamt something weird in which i will not go into simply b/c it was just a senseless dream- a hypnotic kind of dream; i was at ocean city md, while a throbbing like sound clunked within my head; it went "clumk(pause) clunk, "pause", clunk, clunk, clunk... and then repeats for a long time while i slept.  nevertheless, i awoke in panic and the throbbing clunk sound went away.  

i must of been hearing it for 30 minutes to an hour or more, it didn't seem that long.  i am not sure, but darn, i was so relaxed and then at some point i freaked and woke up.  was i abducted?  i asked myself. i suspect it.  several weeks after that, the same thing.  i have just gone to bed at about 3am, and about 4:30am, i heard that same sound and again, i paid no mind to it and was thinking, wow, here is the same sound...  but i thought this in my sleep.  then, i can tell you that my dogs barked to wake me "clunk" "clunk" "clunk."  they were alarmed and were barking hard and scared.  something was out there.  i woke up and checked out what was going on and everything seemed to have come to normal.  next day, i had a feeling my friend knew something.  i called him and talked normally without raising the issue to the point where i asked him if he happened to see any blue lights last night.  he is an all nighter.  

he said, "as a matter of fact i did."  his father who happens to have lung cancer and still smokes like a chimney saw the lights flooding out from underneath his son's bedroom door.  he told steve to "shut that thing off" and steve replied, "it is coming from outside." his father went on to the bathroom to do his business while steve looked out the window to see what was shining so hard and bright.  he said that the blue light was so intense that he felt the heat on his face while looking out from his bedroom window.  it got to the point that he knew he had to step away because it was hurting his eyes.  he got dressed, his father said that it was a helicopter to go back to bed.  steve said "no, there is no helicopter noise, i am going outside and check it out."  as soon as he stepped outside the door, the light stopped and whatever was projecting the light went away.  the next day, a whole tree in his backyard was dead and another was partially dried out.

then we get his other friend involved.  steve asked him if he saw anything and he said yes!  let's call steve's friend "al" who i also know.  al said that he had encountered strange things that night as well and he lives about 2 miles away from where we live.  he said that he saw the craft and even drew it for us.  that at his second floor window he saw what looked like a floating van, but double wide and double the length and had a dark straight rectangular cabin that came around to a fold to around the side.  it was silver in color and at the bottom of the craft had a round like metal thing that looked like it was the thing keeping it a float, but yielded a lot of blue light and that it had the same thing in the rear and it made no sound.  he said that the craft came close to his second floor bedroom window at his building, he heard a cling, cling on his back yard concrete floor and then it went away. 

al thought he was dreaming and went back to sleep.  next morning, al went to his back yard and found this metal piece with writing on it.  it is a semi heavy piece of stainless steel cleanly cut and shaped like an octagon.  it has measured about  8 inches round with
symbols carved on 3 corners.

the symbols look like an upside down i, and then a square next to it, and then next to it is a two sided triangle (without a line in between) with a dot on the upper left, then this... oo  , then e l's but with a gap at the bottom, nit like an l of our alphabet.  it followed with a period in the center and then another square, a line with a groove at the bottom side of the line, a small square with two dots below it and a dot above it, a diamond shape with two sideways goose eggs inside of it (forming like an 8), a full diamond triangle with a square with a dot underneath of it, and other triangles in different sizes with a big circle above it with a line in between it and a a small circle around the upper part of the inner line and a small box next to it with two dots underneath it and above it.

look at included pic.  you may have to magnify or zoom in on it.  the piece was scanned.  you can see the symbols and scratches from being dropped on concrete.

he wants nothing to do with it and gave it to me in exchange that i fix his laptop.  so now, i have it in my posession.  i don't know what it does or what it symbolizes, but all i know it is not from this world. 

steve and i have been looking up at the night sky while walking my dogs and often do see a lot of activity in which normally no one would see because no one is constantly looking up as we have been for the past months.  we see stuff all of the time.  

if anyone looks up at the night sky for at least an hour every night, i guarantee you will see some strange stuff.  moving stars, duck formation perfect moving air crafts with no noise and no blinking lights, almost camuflaged with the night ski flying faster than jets would.  the lights from the tennis courts help aid the visual of these that occurred 3 different times with 3 different fleets.    i am a believer because i have seen more than once and steve has also seen other stuff as well.   we don't have the right equipment to film this stuff every time we go out at night, so we have no footage.  we've tried, but it is too dark for our cheap cameras to pick up, sorry.

nevertheless, in continuation of the experience, i sometimes come to steve's house late at night.  i would knock on his window to not wake his parents with a code knock.  well, one night it wasn't me.  he said that he heard knocking without my code at the glass door window at his bedroom.  steve freaked, he turns on the flood light for his backyard, grabs a toy gun (looks real), points it between the curtains to the glass door, opens the curtains and sees a creature with huge black eyes standing close to his glass door staring at him.   he freaked, dropped the toy gun and ran to his parents and alerted them.  of course the entity went away.

the week after, steve's father went for his cancer check up/treatment and doctors found that he has been cured from lung cancer!  and yes, he is still smokes like a chimney.

now that i am writing this, i am begining to realize that it is very evident that most likely, yes! i have been abducted.  for the reason that i had a feeling that steve knew something and asked him if he happened to see blue lights.  he said yes and how did i know to ask such question?  

it is possible that i was in the craft while steve was looking up from his bedroom window that same night.  they also knew that i knock on his bedroom window when i visit late at night to not wake his parents.  evidently, i didn't reveal the secret knock.  this is how steve saw the entity sometime after/ "it" knew where steve's room was.  i am so freaked out! i don't remember the abduction, but all this is coming together now.  most likely even told them that his father had cancer and they probably helped cure him as well after having a little fun with steve.  

i really believe that these particular visitors are harmless and were defenately friendly.  all i know is that i don't remember anything but that i was asleep with that smoothing clunk sound in my head and awoke at the first sign of panic, which was very minimal.

by placing my experience and my friend's experiences, i can put those pieces together and can tell you we've got visited and i got abducted.  and to top it off, we got a present and i ended up with it.  very bizzar stuff.
content.summary: Abduction/intense activity within friends/ alien metal piece w/carved symbols

content.detailedDescription: This trident-shaped object was flying a straight trajectory, traveling east over hamilton, ontario, canada. i can't guess the altitude, but it was low enough so that it was remarkable in that it did not make a sound as would a commercial jet. i would guess that it was moving at the speed of a private jet. it was bright and white, which is why it caught my attention. the prong section of the trident was at the front of the craft.
content.summary: Bright white trident shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
On the date in question my wife and i were sitting on the sun terrace of our house in bulgaria. it's a great place for star gazing as there is very little light pollution. suddenly i spotted what looked like a very bright star moving at what seemed to be at a pace slower than the many planes we see pass by..It was brighter than the north star, it was obviously a powered vehicle as opposed to say a weather balloon. my eyesight without glasses is poor, so i went downstairs got my glasses and returned to sun terrace. the object was now heading east and from what i could see with my aided vision, it was a roughly circular, possibly slightly egg shaped, glowing white object. no pulsating lights, no sound. it eventually vanished but all the time we viewed it it maintained a constant speed. my wife saw the object too, and we discussed what it could be. it was not a plane, balloon, helicopter or even a satellite. we often see satellites with our naked eye and they tend to appear smaller, fainter and travelling much faster. i've also seen 'shooting stars' from our sun terrace and this wasn't one of those.
as a postscript to this incident probably entirely unrelated, we obviously were very excited by this unexplained sighting and kept our eyes on the sky. a few minutes  after the object vanished from our view, we were looking in the general area where we had first seen it, {north} suddenly a fireball, almost like a firework shot across the sky at high speed, before seeming to disintegrate or break in two then vanishing. it was not a firework, there were no sounds or sparks, no sign of anything falling to the the ground. the event was over in less than two seconds and again was witnessed by both of us. the 1st object is unexplainable by me, i'm willing to concede that the 2nd object {fireball} may have been a comet/meteorite/bit of space debris, breaking up as it entered our atmosphere.
content.summary: Object seen travelling north to east in bulgaria.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my back patio when i noticed a starlike flashing light.  i thought it was strange because i have never seen a plane fly over my area, i think my line of sight is out of the take off and flight path of nearby airport.  as i was watching this starlike flashing light, which was pretty high up in the sky; all of the sudden i saw a triangle shaped craft (with a white light in the front, a blue light on one side, and a red light on the other) come out from behind the trees.  it seemed to be heading in the direction of the starlike flashing light.  the starlike flashing light was very small, but it was far away.  the triangle shaped craft was close and compared to the starlike one at least 50 times larger.  upon noticing the triangle shaped craft it only took it seconds to be out of my view.  it was there and then it was gone.
i went to get my camera afterwards just in case it came back but when i turned it on all i got was static and lines.
content.summary: Saw starlike flashing light proceeded by triangle craft

content.detailedDescription:
I live in a somewhat rural part of western maryland.  we are on a 2 acre lot and there is another field beyond our property of at least 2 acres or more.  

about 1:30am, just before i went to bed, i noticed 3 circular lights in the field beyond our property that i'd never seen before.  because it is so dark around our homes, it was hard to tell exactly where the light were situated.  i went out on to our deck to get a better look, but i still could not determine the distance or the source of the lights.  they seemed to be all the same size and equally spaced apart.  i took several pictures with a digital camera and using my computer software, i tried to make the image more clear and/or more detailed, but i really couldn't see anything else.  i thought perhaps you could shed some light on this incident or perhaps you have the type of equipment to analyze the photographs in more detail.  by the way, i have not seen the lights since.

because i was not sure that what i was seeing was anything out of the ordinary, i took the pictures and went to bed.  they seemed to be stationary and were not moving or pulsating.  in addition, there was absolutely no sound.  (i noticed this when i went out on to the deck) it wasn't until i started showing them to friends and family that it occured to me that i may have actually caught something unusual.

the following night, i look out at the house across the field from us and could plainly see that when they left outside house light on, you could see part of the structure illuminated, so i know that isn't what i saw the night before.  i hope you can give me some more information on what this might be.

you will notice that the first picture is lighter than the rest.  i accidentally had the flash on for the this photo. (i have a few more photos if you would like to have them as well)
content.summary: Three circular lights in a field

content.detailedDescription:
I went out side to let my dog out and i live near philadelphia airport and i  air plains all day long. this was not an air plain its was much brighter thats why it caught my eye. it seemed to be gaining altitude and coming closer to me at the same time it was not like any satellite i have ever seen and it was not a plane and made no should that i could hear and the it turned to a dim red and disappeared. i thought it might me the space station but i went on line and look up where its location was in real time and it was not visible at that time so it wasn't that.

http://spaceflight.Nasa.Gov/realdata/tracking/
content.summary: Very bright object with no faa lights

content.detailedDescription:
This wasn���t the first sighting of a ufo, in 1964 a friend and i watched many strange light traverse the heavens and with assurance we could say they were not satellites. satellites cannot perform maneuvers of a triangle from horizon to horizon in less than 10 seconds. part of this is important to the latter part of this saga because it is of a bizarre parallel event. my friend joined the navy but while he was gone there were more ufo sightings near and around bartlesville.

i had seen many lights in the far distant stop in flight and descend where there had been reports made by other people. but on one particular afternoon i happened to look to the n.E. and see a saturn type of ufo. it was a mirror like sphere with a disconnected ring about the middle. this i thought could only be an hallucination as there was as there was a helical cork screw of fire coming from the bottom that was distended from the sphere and rotating in a clockwise manor. the only thought i can recall of this is that all of this goes against the laws of physics.

this encounter i remember happened sometime before i was married in 1966 and that was in may, i remember that it was warm and the grass was just turning green. that was an important factor as when i first saw this object i thought it might be a crop dusting craft. well actually the first thought was that it was one of those aluminum sided trucks in the distance as the reflection from the metal from time to time was blinding me as i drove down highway 75 from bartlesville to tulsa to see my future wife.

my background to this sighting is that at this time i was a confused 18-year-old teenager with anger management problems that had tossed a job as a photojournalist out the window because of psychological reasons.

the total length of this event may have been as long as 20 minutes. it all began as a trip to see my girlfriend which was a 30 or so minute drive along highway 75. at first there was this annoying flash of bright sunlight in the distance on the road in front of me. it was much like the reflection of sunlight from the rear of a polished metal van and it was becoming irritating that truckers had vans like this just because they looked cool when parked.

after about 5 min of this irritation this turned to the e. on what i thought to be a road in the far distance. but to my amazement this luminous object did a rapid turnaround and was traveling w. i thought this to be very curious because a big rig doesn���t have the capabilities to rapidly change directions; then again it changed directions so i thought maybe this was an aerial crop duster. i was thinking that it must be a bell helicopter with the sun reflecting off the bubble canopy they have. also at that time it was a widely used helicopter for crop dusting. in high school i was in the civil air patrol and became very good at identifying aircraft.

an older friend of the family was a crop duster in arizona so i thought i might stop a while and watch him work as it appeared that it was working his was toward me. the craft made two or three east to west and west to east passes then began a low lever flight northward about 200 meters parallel to the highway much like a crop duster would do. the distance was still over a half mile away but i could tell that it was something hovering over the ground at about 10 meters or less.

as it traveled toward me the first thing i noticed was the silence of this craft, it was still about a half mile away but there was no sound and that was a very curious thing to me, conventional aircraft make noise at miles away. i think one of my early impressions was that if this is a helicopter traveling that close to the ground why wasn���t there any noise or dust being thrown up by the downdraft?

this object kept traveling northward in my direction until i recognized that it was nothing like anything of this world. it was a perfect sphere like that of a mirror, reflecting all that is around it. on it���s surface i could see the ground the sky and the sun beaming back at me. the sun was low on the horizon just minutes before dusk now and the orange orb reflecting from this orb was tolerable enough to be mesmerized by the beauty of a 20 meter mirror sphere with all the world reflecting from it. it was like the sphere in  1984 movie the starman.

when i stopped my vehicle i did stop in the shadow of a surrounding hill and by chance gave me an opportunity to witness something i haven���t heard of anyone else mention in all these years of reading ufo reports. there could be i just haven���t read about it yet. the oddity was that when this spherical object crossed the line of sunlight into the shadow it was like dissolving of the sphere and out came the flying disk.

at this point the hair on the back of my neck must have been standing straight out because the hair on my head was beginning to tingle. in fact my whole body was beginning to vibrate almost out of control. the object had changed course and was coming straight at me. the adrenalin was pumping so hard my heart went past my throat and felt like it was pounding somewhere in my brain. as it approached a red portal appeared and rotated to my direction, within that portal i saw a being shadowed with barely enough frontal light to distinguish that it was a humanoid face and it was looking directly at me.

i have never been that terrified in my life because as it approached it had to rise in the air to clear the power lines to fly directly overhead. i don���t remember exactly what i thought at that moment but as that moment went i remember looking for my camera and thinking about temporal distortions.

i sat there looking out all windows of my vehicle waiting to see where it was going but it never passed overhead. it was like that scene where the girl has to open the door even though she knows there is a boogieman out there. so i���m setting there wondering where this craft is and i know it is straight overhead. finally i get the courage to open the car door and look up. 

the sky was clear and the sun had gone passed the horizon and it was one of those picture perfect spring afternoons. there is nothing that could have prepared me for this experience. it truly changes all religious views and your prospective on government information.

later in years i reunited with my high school chum and on comparing life notes it seems that he too had a ufo experience while on board of a frigate escort ship. from his recounting of his tale it would seem that we had our experiences around the same period except that he exclaimed that his ufo was much larger and followed the uss joulet for a number of days. he was a fire control technician and said that it never showed up on his radar and for something that was about half the size of a frigate destroyer is an accomplishment. said he had pictures but when they came back they were in quarantine and locked down. also told that things would happen to them if they ever told anyone about this encounter. 

i have no idea if his encounter was real or not but then how would anyone ever know if mine was real.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Up close and personal with a flying disc. it transforms out of an energy shell when not in direct light.

content.detailedDescription:
July 5, before sundown, (about 9pm) it was still a clear blue sky. i invited my neighbor to my house, we were sitting outside in chairs, talking, then i notice a very bright red/ orange light, "solid"?, not blinking ( was strange) west of us at about 10 o`clock going east at a speed of a (my first thought was) helicopter or plane, i do not know the distance, but from our place it, (light) was about the  size of the round end of a q tip, "very bright red/orange" and asked neighbor if he knew what it was, we tried to hear, but no sound of plane, and could see nothing attached to it.  so we tried to follow it, as it then went behind a tree.
we waited and it went past the tree, and it just stopped for a few seconds, and it changed directions,it went north, and "up" at about 2 o`clock at a 
very high rate of speed, within a 3-4 seconds it got smaller to a pin head, then gone. 
  i have never seen anything like it, it was not a balloon, firework, helicopter, or plane.  a day or so later  "history channel" had something on ufo`s and some people reported about what we saw. then i got on the internet, "ufo site" and some other reports were like what we saw. there are photo`s on internet about the same as we saw. i am 71 years old and have never gotten into ufo sightings. now they have my attention. 
  i wrote to cufos, they gave me your e-mail address.
could you explain this?  please e-mail me your thoughts on this.
                      regards,  john border
                                      john1525@comcast.Net
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A very bright red/orange light,  round

content.detailedDescription:
My apologies for being imprecise about the dates but i���ve got the times right. one or two weekends ago (either on or about july 18 or 25) i was out after dark in tumwater, wa, which is just south of the state capitol of olympia. i looked up in the sky and saw three steady points of light in the shape of an equilateral triangle heading southwest. the back two lights were white. the front was sort of a peachy amber. the triangle appeared to be passing a star-like object, which i assumed was jupiter. the lights seemed to be on a somewhat twisty path until i realized that this was an illusion caused by the fact that "jupiter" was  quite visibly heading east���a coincidence i am not happy to report this as it makes my story considerably more unbelievable without really getting anything in return. it was way too large to be a satellite but, since it was well past the angle where the landing lights of a conventional aircraft would be expected to disappear and be replaced by colored blinkers, i wondered if maybe my memory might be strangely off. to make this story even more needlessly unbelievable, at that exact moment i saw a faint point of light���that is what i would presume to be an actual satellite���cross  "jupiter���s" path heading north as if presenting itself for purposes of comparison. how do you like them coincidental apples? after the two unkowns were out of site i checked the clock of my truck which read 10:22 pm. about three hours later at exactly 1:30 am i saw another white light, this one smaller than jupiter but still way too large to be a satellite, heading southeast across the night sky at about the clip of a jet airplane. this time i had the presence of mind to pull out my binoculars. as far as i could tell the light was steady and alone without any blinkers or other colored lights. 

since then i've seen two more solid night lights, most recently last night (aug. 2nd) when i saw a satellite-sized pinpoint of light heading north at high speed. unlike the others which simply kept moving until behind trees or over the top of a hill, this one dimmed out and vanished. i forgot to get the time but there was some vestigial daylight glimmering past the horizon.  

i've been working outside at night for a year-and-a-half. i am used to seeing all kinds of aircraft heading out of pdx and the olympia airport. these babies are new to me. they haven't suddenly stopped or changed course or suddenly zoomed off at impossibly radical speeds of any of that jazz i'm used to reading about. but, even so, i do not recognize what i've been seeing.

my emotional state can be summed up by the words "hm. what do you know about that?"
content.summary: Unusual triangular lights + three other star-like objects

content.detailedDescription:
It happens yesterday 02.08.08, at 22:00h german time. i was at home in belin preparing my selve for going to work. it was really hot and all the windows in my apartament were open. so i go to close the window in my room and i saw  like 6 or 7 mooving stars - it was beautifull. i have the feeling that they had the formation of the big bear, cart wheel stars - my english is bad. after that i saw another 6 and than another 3. they hide behind the bildings.  i saw them on the top of alexander plats tower they were mooving nord east. i was really exsited and made a publication in one web site. then i lieve my home going to work but i saw another one on the top of kreuizberg - oposite direction. i go back home write for the other one in the same web site and than go to work. the whole night i was asking people for what i have seen but nobody else was seeng them. so now i am trying to find another witneses and to share info wiht them. i was feeling bad becouse i dindt have any foto camera or foto aparat. i was near to screem to one woman in the city block in front of my own but i decided that its too bold and didnt make it. 
when i saw them for the first time i was thinking that they are airplains but they were not for sure! they were not baloons or china feners - flying lights. they were mooving to slow for airplanes and some of them in the circle. they were in almost red color like the star of planet mars but many time stronger and more shiny. they get hide behind the bildings in my neigbour in 20 mins.
content.summary: 15 ufos looks like stars but really shiny mooving
